description:
As an unauthenticated user
         User would like to browse through available series
              And is able to play selected episodes

elements.name: unthenticated user plays the selected episode

steps.name: user has generated the test data
user is on salesforce plus platform
user navigates to episodes page and clicks on a particular episode
user is able to play the episode

name: Unauthenticated Flow

elements.name: Verify episode details are present in the episode details modal

steps.name: user has generated the test data
guest user loads salesforce plus platform
user navigates to episodes page and clicks on a particular episode
user is able to verify episode number: "EPISODE 1"
user is able to verify series title: "LEADING THROUGH CHANGE"
user is able to verify episode title: "How a Coffee Shop Continues Serving Customers from Home"
user is able to verify speaker one name and card title: "Ben Wright & Co-Founders, Bitty and Beau's Coffee"
user is able to verify speaker two name and card title: "Bill Patterson & EVP, CRM Applications, Salesforce"
